mean_en: an insulting way of thinking or behaving that comes from believing that you are better, smarter, or more important than other people
word_etyma: ar一再+rog要求,问+ance名词后缀 →傲慢
short_phrase: He displays an air of arrogance.
sentence: I can't stand his arrogance--he blew his cigarette smoke right at me!
sentence_trans: 我简直无法忍受他的傲慢。他对着我吹烟气。
